variants_120_char: MitthuuG — Premium Til-Gud Bites crafted with pure jaggery & roasted sesame. Ancient taste meets modern wellness. Perfect for gifting.
Handcrafted Sesame & Jaggery Bites — No refined sugar, no preservatives. Just honest nutrition wrapped in tradition. Shop now.
Discover MitthuuG: Artisan Til-Gud Bites made fresh daily. Pure ingredients, zero guilt. The snack your grandmother would approve.
hero_paragraph: Handcrafted from pure jaggery and roasted seeds — your new go-to snack for every season.
Ancient wisdom meets modern wellness. Pure jaggery, crunchy sesame, zero compromises.
Traditional sweets, reworked for everyday snacking. No refined sugar, just honest goodness.

usps.title: 100% Natural Ingredients
usps.tagline: Pure jaggery, roasted sesame, zero preservatives — just like your grandmother made it.
usps.supporting_line: Every bite is made with organic jaggery and premium roasted seeds. No refined sugar, no artificial flavors.

usps.title: Handcrafted in Small Batches
usps.tagline: Made fresh daily in small batches to ensure premium quality and authentic taste.
usps.supporting_line: We craft each batch by hand to preserve traditional methods and guarantee freshness in every pack.

usps.title: Guilt-Free Indulgence
usps.tagline: Rich in iron, protein & healthy fats — snack smart without compromising on taste.
usps.supporting_line: Sesame and jaggery pack natural nutrients. Energy when you need it, wellness with every bite.

brand_promise.headline: Our Promise
brand_promise.subheadline: Crafted with care, delivered with love

value_propositions.for_gifting: Perfect for festivals, celebrations, or just because — MitthuuG makes thoughtful gifting delicious.
value_propositions.for_snacking: Stash a pack in your desk drawer, gym bag, or kitchen. Your anytime energy boost.
value_propositions.for_wellness: Sesame + jaggery = natural iron, calcium & antioxidants. Wellness that tastes incredible.
